name: @Purify_1D
author: Ziad S. Saad
description: Purifies a series of 1D files for faster I/O into matlab.

inputs.description: The sub-brick selection mode to output a select number of columns, following AFNI conventions.
inputs.name: Sub-brick selection

inputs.description: STRING is attached to the output prefix which is formed from the input names.
inputs.name: Output suffix
